modals.addUpToFavorites_other: You can add up to {{count}} more favorite validators
modals.addedToBond: This amount of {{unit}} will be added to your current bonded funds.
modals.afterClaiming: Funds will be immediately available as free balance after claiming.
modals.allowToJoin: Allow new members to join the pool.
modals.bondingWithdraw: Bonding will also withdraw your outstanding rewards of
modals.braveText: To Brave users! Due to a recent update (Brave version 1.36), there may appear issues while using light clients (e.g. not connected).
modals.changeNomination: Once submitted, your nominations will be removed from your dashboard immediately, and will not be nominated from the start of the next era.
modals.claimOutstandingCommission: Claim any outstanding commission in the pool reward account.
modals.claimReward1: Once submitted, your rewards will be bonded back into the pool. You own these additional bonded funds and will be able to withdraw them at any time.
modals.claimReward2: Withdrawing rewards will immediately transfer them to your account as free balance.
modals.claimsOnBehalf: Claiming a payout claims on behalf of every nominator backing the validator for the era you are claiming for. For this reason transaction fees are usually higher, and most nominators rely on the validator to claim on their behalf.
modals.connectLedgerToContinue: Connect your Ledger device to continue.
modals.controllerImported: You must have your controller account imported to sign this transaction.
modals.decentralizationAnalyticsNotSupported: Decentralization analytics not Supported in this Network
modals.destroyPoolResult: Once you Destroy the pool, all members can be permissionlessly unbonded, and the pool can never be reopened.
modals.ensureLedgerIsConnected: Tip: Ensure your Ledger device is connected before continuing.
modals.fastUnstakeCurrentQueue: Number of accounts currently in the fast unstake queue
modals.fastUnstakeExposedAgo_one: You were last exposed {{count}} Era Ago
modals.fastUnstakeExposedAgo_other: You were last exposed {{count}} Eras Ago
modals.fastUnstakeNote1: To register for fast unstake, you must not be actively staking for more than {{bondDuration}} eras.
modals.fastUnstakeNote2_one: If you are inactive for at least {{count}} more Era, you will be able to register for fast unstake.
modals.fastUnstakeNote2_other: If you are inactive for at least {{count}} more Eras, you will be able to register for fast unstake.
modals.fastUnstakeOnceRegistered: Once registerd you will be waiting in the fast unstake queue.
modals.fastUnstakeUnorderedNote: The fast unstake queue is unordered, so the exact timing of being selected is not known.
modals.fastUnstakeWarningUnlocksActiveMore: No unlocks can be active to register for fast unstake. Rebond or withdraw your unlocks to become fully bonded and try registering for fast unstake again.
modals.favoritesAddedSubtitle_one: {{count}} validator has been added to your nominees
modals.favoritesAddedSubtitle_other: {{count}} validators have been added to your nominees
modals.feedbackPage: We host a feedback page on
modals.ledgerDeviceBusy: The Ledger device is currently being used for something else.
modals.ledgerRequestTimeout: The Ledger request timed out. Please try again.
modals.ledgerWillBeReset: Your Ledger address list will be reset, and any imported accounts will be removed from the dashboard.
modals.lockPoolSubtitle: Once you lock the pool no one else can join the pool.
modals.methodNotSupported: Call method not supported, cannot sign.
modals.missingNesting: Call missing nesting support, cannot sign.
modals.moreFavoritesSurpassLimit: Adding more favorites will surpass {{max}} nominations.
modals.newlyBondedFunds: Newly bonded funds will back active nominations from the start of the next era.
modals.noEnough: You do not have enough free balance to register for fast unstake. Fast unstake requires a deposit of
modals.noNominatorRole: You do not have a nominator role in any pools.
modals.noProxyAccountsDeclared: No proxy accounts have been declared.
modals.noReadOnlyAdded: No Read Only accounts have been added
modals.noRewards: You have no rewards to claim.
modals.noVaultAccountsImported: No Polkadot Vault accounts have been imported.
modals.notMeetMinimum: You do not meet the minimum nominator bond of {{minNominatorBondUnit}} {{unit}}. Please bond some funds before nominating.
modals.notToClaim: Validators usually claim payouts on behalf of their nominators. If you decide not to claim here, it is likely you will receive your payouts within 1-2 days of them becoming available.
modals.notePoolDepositorMinBond_depositor: As the pool depositor you must maintain a bond of at least {{bond}} {{unit}}.
modals.notePoolDepositorMinBond_member: As a pool member you must maintain a bond of at least {{bond}} {{unit}}.
modals.onceUnbonding: Once unbonding, your funds will become available after {{bondDurationFormatted}}.
modals.onceUnbondingPoolMember: Once unbonding, it will take {{bondDurationFormatted}} for these funds to unlock. Once unlocked, they can be withdrawn.
modals.openAppOnLedger: Open the {{appName}} app on your Ledger device.
modals.queuedTransactionRejected: Previous transaction rejected. Please try again.
modals.readOnlyCannotSign: Your account is read only, and cannot sign transactions.
modals.rebondSubtitle: Rebonded funds will back active nominations from the start of the next era.
modals.rebondUnlock: You can rebond unlocks at any time in this period, or withdraw them to your free balance thereafter.
modals.registerFastUnstake: Registering for fast unstake requires a deposit of
modals.reserveText: Control how much {{unit}} is reserved to pay for transaction fees. This amount is added on top of any funds needed to cover the existential deposit to your account.
modals.revertNominationChanges: Are you sure you wish to revert the changes to your selected nominations?
modals.selectRpcProvider: Select an RPC provider to change the {{network}} node Staking Dashboard connects to.
modals.sentToCommissionPayee: This amount will be sent to the commission payee account configured for this pool.
modals.setToDestroyingSubtitle: Setting a pool to destroying cannot be reversed. Only set this state if you intend to close the pool.
modals.stopJoiningPool: Stop new members from joining the pool.
modals.stopNominatingBefore: Stop nominating before unbonding all funds.
modals.storedOnChain: Your updated name will be stored on-chain as encoded bytes. The update will take effect immediately.
modals.thisMinimumDelay_one: This minimum delay is the approximate equivalent of {{count}} block.
modals.thisMinimumDelay_other: This minimum delay is the approximate equivalent of {{count}} blocks.
modals.transactionRejectedPending: Transaction was rejected and is still pending.
modals.unbondErrorBelowMinimum: Unable to unbond. Your bonded funds are below the minumum of {{bond}} {{unit}}.
modals.unbondFundsLeavePool: Unbond your funds and leave the nomination pool.
modals.unbondToMaintain: Unbond up to the {{minJoinBondUnit}} {{unit}} minimum to maintain your pool membership
modals.unbondToMinimumCreate: Unbond up to the {{minCreateBondUnit}} {{unit}} minimum bond for pool depositors.
modals.unbondingWithdraw: Unbonding will also withdraw your outstanding rewards of
modals.unlockChunk: Unlock chunks cannot currently be rebonded in a pool. If you wish to rebond, withdraw the unlock chunk first and re-bond the funds.
modals.unlockLedgerToContinue: Unlock your Ledger device to continue.
modals.unlockPoolSubtitle: Once a pool is unlocked, any account will be able to join as a pool member.
modals.updateName: Update the public name of the pool.
modals.updateWhoClaimRewards: Update who can claim rewards on your behalf.
modals.welcomeToReport: Bug reports, feature requests and improvements are all welcome.
modals.willSurpass: Adding this many favorites will surpass {{maxNominations}} nominations.
modals.withdrawRemoveNote: Withdrawing will remove this member from the pool.
modals.withdrawSubtitle: Funds will be immediately available as free balance after withdrawing.
